NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
COLEUS: Friends, the forge has asked for one more shipment of ore from our mines to be delivered to the <color=orange>Volcanic Testing Site.</color>
2
1
CYCAD: Isn't the construction of <color=lightblue>Ash Twin's</color> protective shell complete? What will this new shipment of ore be used for?
3 2
COLEUS: In the construction of the <color=orange>Sanctuary,</color> my dear apprentice!
4 3
COLEUS: Though it was formed on this planet, the ore still requires treatment at <color=lightblue>Hollow's Lantern</color> to reach its full capabilities.
5 4
CYCAD: I see. Has a suitable site for the <color=orange>Sanctuary</color> been chosen already?
6
5
COLEUS: It has! We have chosen a site located in the planet's underground pools, visited by a wandering quantum shard.
7
6
COLEUS: We will need to put extra eyes into carefully reinforcing the walls of the <color=orange>Sanctuary,</color> to prevent the surrounding water from penetrating the protective shell.
Campsite EX1 1
Campsite EX2 6
SY R2 6
SY R3 4
